item.title: Several rats outside linden court, 25th July
item.description:
This whole block of flats is a health hazard - the bin area has several rats running around and out onto the public pavement. Residents regularly fly tip their own rubbish on the pavement and residents have reported thus dozens of time. There are now literally rats crawling around on public land. Please can the council provide a written response as to what is being done at linden court?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Anerley Park, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Drain outside 21 Queensway too low and causing damage to my daughters car, 25th July
item.description:
She reported this and today two council workmen arrived, dug around the drain and left. My daughter told them she needed to use her car at 5ish and was told that it would be made safe by then. Unfortunately, they did not speak good English. They didn't inform my daughter that they were leaving and now the dip from her driveway is worse. They didn't even leave a yellow board prop which would have helped to drive off driveway. My daughter suffers with bipolar and this has stressed her considerably. I need this sorted ASAP because it will become a serious problem for her. Also if her car wheels get damaged Bromley Council will be liable as this drain has been left in a worse state than it was before and it is dangerous as she will have to get on and off very carefully and cars drive very fast down queensway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Queensway, Poverest, Orpington, London
Report on FixMyStreet
